title: Quick Start for Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise and ManageIQ
subtitle: Adding Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise (with Metrics Enabled) as a Container Provider

abstract.para: This document provides a quick guide for integrating Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise container services (with metrics enabled) with ManageIQ. It is intended as an abridged reference for users already familiar with ManageIQ, Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise, and Red Hat Enterprise Linux.
